attributes.action: to make british sign language a compulsory subject in school
attributes.additional_details: the deaf community is a massive part of the uk which is isolated because the children in schools aren’t taught it as much as other equally important languages
attributes.background: i want the government to make british sign language a compulsory subject in schools across the uk like spanish or french, as there are many people in and around the uk who we can’t communicate with because of this language barrier

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make British Sign Language a compulsory subject in the national curriculum
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331031
